pageContext.claim: “United States Steel is expanding. We're building brand new plants and beautiful new expansions. They haven't done it in 35 years.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has given various versions of an alleged call with the head of U.S. Steel. He sometimes says U.S. Steel would open six or seven facilities. U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of six facilities, nor is there evidence that Trump had a phone call with the head of U.S. Steel. The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
